title: Blondy's First Birthday
backCoverBlurb: Blondy's turning 1! A celebration story with cake, balloons, and family. Join Blondy on her most special day yet.
characterDescription: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. She has a wide, happy smile. She is wearing a bright red t-shirt under blue denim overalls.

pages.text: Today is a very special day. It is Blondy's first birthday!
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy with curly blonde hair and blue eyes smiling happily in her red shirt and denim overalls.

pages.text: Look at all the bright balloons! Red, blue, and yellow.
pages.imagePrompt: A bunch of colorful balloons tied to a chair in a sunny room.

pages.text: Blondy's family is here to celebrate. Happy Birthday! they sing.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy's family clapping and smiling around her.

pages.text: There is a big, yummy cake with one little candle.
pages.imagePrompt: A delicious birthday cake with a single candle on top.

pages.text: Blondy looks at the cake. She wants a little taste!
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy looking curiously at the birthday cake.

pages.text: Yay! Cake is so sweet and delicious.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy with a bit of frosting on her nose, laughing.

pages.text: Blondy opens a present. It's a soft, new teddy bear!
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy holding a new brown teddy bear.

pages.text: Everyone is playing and having so much fun.
pages.imagePrompt: Children playing with toys on a colorful rug.

pages.text: Blondy loves her birthday party very much.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy sitting among wrapping paper, looking happy.

pages.text: The sun is setting. It was a wonderful day.
pages.imagePrompt: Warm sunlight coming through the window at the end of the party.

pages.text: Blondy is a big girl now. She is one year old!
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy looking proud with a '1' on her shirt.
Blondy sleeping peacefully in her crib.
